# Discrete Log Problem - Cryptography Assignment

[Discrete Logarithm Problem](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Discrete_logarithm)

## Build

```sh
make clean build
```

## Usage

```sh
python3 discrete.py
```

### Executing

```sh
python3 discrete.py
```
